description: Implement high-priority security and performance improvements for ShopHub e-commerce platform
context:
Successfully implemented all high-priority security and performance improvements:
1. Created Zod validation schemas for all forms and API inputs (auth, products, orders, reviews)
2. Implemented rate limiting middleware with IP-based tracking and automatic cleanup
3. Created React error boundary component with user-friendly error UI
4. Added database optimization SQL with composite indexes for common query patterns
5. Set up comprehensive testing infrastructure with Jest and React Testing Library
6. Optimized bundle with package imports and production console removal
7. Enabled TypeScript strict mode with additional safety checks
8. Created API helper functions for validation, rate limiting, and standardized responses
9. Added environment variable validation with Zod
10. Implemented security headers middleware

All code is production-ready and documented in IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md
